org.pragmaticminds.crunch.api.records

Interface MRecord

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CRecord, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TypedValues, UntypedValues

    public interface MRecord
extends CRecord
    Interface for Machine Records. Machine Records are basically characterized by the following
    • They have a timestamp
    • They have a source identifier
    • They have not only one value for this timestamp but several (possibly many)
    Thus, this interface consists of getters for
    • timestamp
    • source
    • the contained items
    Several typesafe getter methods are provided. If a channel does not exist they have to throw a UnknownRecordItemException and if the value cannot be provided in the expected type a RecordItemConversionException should be thrown.
    Author:
    julian Created by julian on 03.11.17
